txt.en: 'Somewhere in the depths of Haudh Nírui, the Blogmal gang-leader commands his minions to rob and defile the tombs within. Defeating this menace might be enough to scare off the goblins temporarily.'
Return to the mission giver and tell him you have defeated the Blogmal gang-leader
With your mission in the ruins successful, you should return to the mission giver and tell him you have defeated the Blogmal gang-leader.
'You have done well [placeholder], as agreed, you are deserving of payment. Take this and know that we are grateful for all you have done.'
'Be careful in the depths of Haudh Nírui, [placeholder].'
Speak with the mission giver. Travel to Haudh Nírui and search for the Blogmal gang-leader. Defeat it and as many goblins as you can to drive them out of the tomb.
There is no twist in this mission.
Complete the Mission: The Tearful Tomb
Haudh Nírui has been overrun by grave-robbing goblins. If we defeat their leader we may be able to scare them off for now.
